Welcome to my personal webpage!
-----

I am a PhD student in **Environmental and Development Economics**.\
My research focuses on the adaptation to **climate change** in Sub-Saharan Africa.

You can contact me at my [email adress](mailto:edouard.pignede@gmail.com).

I am currently working at [NovAfrica](https://novafrica.org/) (Nova SBE) in Lisbon as a research fellow.

Research Labs
------------
- [Paris-Saclay Applied Economics (AgroParisTech - INRAE)](https://www6.versailles-grignon.inrae.fr/psae)
- [Climate Economic Chair (Paris-Dauphine University)](https://www.chaireeconomieduclimat.org/en/)
- [NovAfrica (Nova SBE)](https://novafrica.org/)
